segments.text: The illusionist is supported by HSBC.
segments.translation: The illusionist is supported by HSBC.
segments.romanized: The illusionist is supported by HSBC.

segments.text: Did you know you can get up to $700 when you start banking with HSBC?
segments.translation: Did you know you can get up to $700 when you start banking with HSBC?
segments.romanized: Did you know you can get up to $700 when you start banking with HSBC?

segments.text: Plus, you could pay no monthly banking fees, but really you get much, much more.
segments.translation: Plus, you could pay no monthly banking fees, but really you get much, much more.
segments.romanized: Plus, you could pay no monthly banking fees, but really you get much, much more.

segments.text: Banking with HSBC has many advantages like zero dollar global wire transfer fees,
segments.translation: Banking with HSBC has many advantages like zero dollar global wire transfer fees,
segments.romanized: Banking with HSBC has many advantages like zero dollar global wire transfer fees,

segments.text: no interact E transfer fees and access to over 3,380M all over the country.
segments.translation: no interact E transfer fees and access to over 3,380M all over the country.
segments.romanized: no interact E transfer fees and access to over 3,380M all over the country.

segments.text: And also I've noticed that HSBC offers 10 gender neutral titles,
segments.translation: And also I've noticed that HSBC offers 10 gender neutral titles,
segments.romanized: And also I've noticed that HSBC offers 10 gender neutral titles,

segments.text: not just misdru and misses and miss, which is often all you'll give in the title options.
segments.translation: not just misdru and misses and miss, which is often all you'll give in the title options.
segments.romanized: not just misdru and misses and miss, which is often all you'll give in the title options.

segments.text: Visit HSBC.ca slash offers today to get started.
segments.translation: Visit HSBC.ca slash offers today to get started.
segments.romanized: Visit HSBC.ca slash offers today to get started.

segments.text: Terms and conditions apply, HSBC bank, together we thrive.
